title: S15 Ep7: I Kissed a Ghost (and I Liked It)!
itunes:title: I Kissed a Ghost (and I Liked It)!
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS visits with guest Concetta Bertoldi who declares, I Kissed a Ghost (and I Liked It)!
Listen Free Here-->

Many people visit a medium to be reassured that their loved ones are nearby. Your grief is only as deep as your love, and those who have died are in the AIR you breathe?they are always in reach. With her trademark warmth and humor, Concetta shows us how to see evidence of ghosts and spirits in this world, and how to accept their help. PLUS some fun and interesting stories from her life and career.

Get her book here: amazon.com

Visit her website: https://www.concettabertoldi.com/

Support our sponsors for great deals!
